name: Electric Scooters in the Way
description:
We were warned. But we did not listen.

It is the year 2080. When the first Electro-Scooters came on the market, people cheered. 
They were going to beat climate change. 
Make cars obsolete. 
Cure cancer.

But they did not.

The Electro-Scooter population grew rapidly. They overran earth. 
When we fled to Mars, they followed. 
Now every planet in the known universe is nothing but Electro-Scooters. 

But there is one man fighting back. 
He‘s from a time before Electro-Scooters and he alone holds the key to defeating them.

By shooting Glam-Pigs at the red ball.
____________________________________________________

ESW in a physics-based puzzle in space. Your goal is to shoot pigs onto a target planet, while avoiding gravitational attractions of other celestial bodies.
